CustomField.formula: IF(Day(Start_Date__c) - 10 <= 0, 'early', IF(Day(Start_Date__c) - 20 <= 0, 'middle', 'late')) + ' ' + CASE( MONTH(Start_Date__c), 1, 'January', 2, 'February', 3, 'March', 4, 'April', 5, 'May', 6, 'June', 7, 'July', 8, 'August', 9, 'September', 10, 'October', 11, 'November', 12, 'December', null ) + ' to ' + IF(Day(End_Date__c ) - 10 <= 0, 'early', IF(Day(End_Date__c ) - 20 <= 0, 'middle', 'late')) + ' ' + CASE( MONTH(End_Date__c ), 1, 'January', 2, 'February', 3, 'March', 4, 'April', 5, 'May', 6, 'June', 7, 'July', 8, 'August', 9, 'September', 10, 'October', 11, 'November', 12, 'December', null )
CustomField.label: Course Duration
